attributes.title: Capture the Flag Shenanigans - Let's Play Minimations #1
attributes.caption: Capture the Flag Shenanigans
attributes.description: The Lads and Gents face off in a game of CTF, and hilarity ensues.
attributes.display_title: Capture the Flag Shenanigans - Let's Play Minimations #1

attributes.title: Destiny Calls - Let's Play Minimations #2
attributes.caption: Destiny Calls
attributes.description: The fun never ends in Let's Play Minimations #2! This time, Ray does some spins, Michael throws an ill-advised grenade, and Gavin wastes his golden gun.

attributes.title: Bananigans - Let's Play Minimations #3
attributes.caption: Bananigans
attributes.description: In this let's play minimation, the gang is on the look out for a British banana on the run!Lets Play - Prop Hunt Part 1

attributes.title: Cake and Death - Let's Play Minimations #4
attributes.caption: Cake and Death
attributes.description: The AH lads and gents learn how deadly eating cake can be.
attributes.display_title: Cake and Death - Let's Play Minimations #4

attributes.title: Friendly? Friendly - Let's Play Minimations #5
attributes.caption: Friendly? Friendly
attributes.description: Ryan gives Gavin a friendly greeting. Later, Jack makes an alliance with Gavin which Ryan quickly cuts short.

attributes.title: Gavin vs. Ryan - Let's Play Minimations #6
attributes.caption: Gavin vs. Ryan
attributes.description: Two moments from Minecraft Let's Plays of Gavin killing Ryan and Ryan killing Gavin. Can't we all just get a long Gavin kills the king, but Ryan doesn't "miss" an opportunity to get even.
attributes.display_title: Gavin vs. Ryan - Let's Play Minimations #6

attributes.title: Gavin vs. Shelving - Let's Play Minimations #7
attributes.caption: Gavin vs. Shelving
attributes.description: Achievement Hunter takes on their ancient nemesis, gravity, as Gavin fights a bookshelf, Ryan parachutes, and Geoff jumps around, jumps around, gets up, gets up and gets down.
attributes.display_title: Gavin vs. Shelving - Let's Play Minimations #7

attributes.title: Mind the Gap - Let's Play Minimations #8
attributes.caption: Mind the Gap
attributes.description: Gavin's wish is Geoff's command.... much to Gavin's regret. Meanwhile, Jack asks "How does cake"
attributes.display_title: Mind the Gap - Let's Play Minimations #8

attributes.title: Technical Difficulties - Let's Play Minimations #9
attributes.caption: Technical Difficulties
attributes.description: Geoff, Ryan, Jack and the gang form their own "Glitch Mob" as they battle game bugs.

attributes.title: The Birds'n'Bees - Let's Play Minimations #10
attributes.caption: The Birds'n'Bees
attributes.description: In this final episode, Geoff does his best "Attack on Titan" impression, the Hunters play "Hide the Handgrenade," and a couple villagers teach Ryan about the birds'n'bees. The blocky, pixelated birds'n'bees...
